title: Youth injured during Mirihana protest has not died
body_lines: Reports circulating that a youth who is undergoing treatment at the Colombo South Teaching Hospital after he was attacked by Police during the protest near the President’s residence in Mirihana has died, is false.
The youth was seen speaking to police and security forces during the protest and it was spread on social media widely.
Police also said that false information was being circulated on social media that a suspect arrested during the protest has died while undergoing treatment.
They said that none of the suspects arrested during protests and who are undergoing treatment at hospitals have died.(Darshana Sanjeewa Balasuriya)
